summary: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.
cast: Brigitte Lin|Tony Chiu-Wai Leung|Faye Wong|Takeshi Kaneshiro|Valerie Chow|Jinquan Chen|Lee-Na Kwan|Zhiming Huang|Liang Zhen|Songshen Zuo|Thom Baker|Rico Chu|Vickie Eng|Lynne Langdon
keywords: hong kong|spoken inner thoughts|drug smuggling|expiration date|canned food
title: Chungking Express
